title: [Account Problem]  Can't login, shows account is in process of transferring when I didn't transfer.
body:
Hello,

I could not log into my account with summoner name "SwiftPanther", which I even reset the password.  When I do the password reset, I received email and was able to reset the password.  But when I attempt to login to the league of legend client, it shows "Your account is in the process of transferring. Please try again in a few minutes.  If the issue persists, contact player support."  Which I did not do any account transfer at all.  When I try to login and open a ticket on the website it says we cannot find the combination of username and password.

What should I do next?  This is really upsetting, since I have invested tons of money into champion and skins......

Please help

Best regards

replies.body: Don't worry, we can work with you and help recover your account.  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which doesn't require logging in.  Our account recovery team will reply back asap to help with restoring things back to normal.  You should also use our[ account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to help make sure your info elsewhere is secured.  Hang tight until we reply back to the ticket!
